Talk2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The grown-ups are back, but I'm still
helping out around the village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm not gonna start taking it easy now!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy>Whoooa! You got all the Rito stuff!
I bet the cold doesn't bother you at all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Even if you go up to the <clr:0000>freezing-cold
mountain peak<clr:ffff>, you'll probably be fine!
Talk2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Honestly, I wasn't sure about being alone
here when all the grown-ups had to go
away 'cause of the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0>But us kids got together and helped out
with running the stores and stuff. It made
us a little more grown-up too!<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard stopped, so the grown-ups
are back. But I'm still gonna help out
around the shop!
Talk2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Evening, mister!<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard stopped, so the grown-ups
are back. But I'm still gonna help out
around the shop!<sp:0:4:0>There's always work to do!
Talk1003: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thanks for coming to the shop, mister!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Hi, hi! Thanks for coming in, even though
it's snowing so hard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It's cold in the village, but it's <clr:0000>even colder
on top of the mountain<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You'll <clr:0000>freeze<clr:ffff> solid at the peak if you don't
<clr:0000>find a way to keep warm<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Lucky for you we sell waaarm clothes!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You must be working hard if you're up
so late. <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff>
armor shop!
Talk1006: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>What brings you to the shop today?
Near2004: Off to another day at work!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Sorry, mister. I wouldn't know what to
do with that.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Whoa! Mister, stop! You gotta take stuff
like that off before I can buy it.
Com_Talk_11b: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Thanks a whole bunch for buying from us!
Com_Talk_11d: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>You'd look pretty good in that, mister!
Talk1008_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Are you leaving, mister? <sp:5:0:0>Let me give you
a neat tip first.
Talk1008_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, mister, have you ever explored a
cave before?
Talk1008_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>People are finding more <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> all the time
on the road east of here and on the way
up the Hebra Mountains!<sp:0:4:0>Caves are nice because they're warm.<sp:5:0:0>
You can hide out from the cold there if
you don't have our outfits.<sp:0:4:0>Plus, you can find shiny <clr:0000>ores <clr:ffff>inside the
sparkly rocks sometimes!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>We'll <clr:0000>pay a lot for those ores<clr:ffff>, and so will
the folks at the general store. So keep an
eagle eye out for them!
Talk1008_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>When you're freezing outside, duck inside
a nearby <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>if it looks warm.<sp:0:4:0>There are plenty of <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>along the road
east of here and on the way up the Hebra
Mountains for you to take shelter in!
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>OK, OK! I'll buy anything for the
right price.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Just tell me what you wanna sell!
near2: Oh! It's too cold for that!
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome to the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak <clr:ffff>armor shop!
We got all the cold protection you need!
Talk1016_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We run the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff> armor shop!<sp:5:1:0>
If you want clothes that'll keep you warm
in the snow, you're in the right place!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak <clr:ffff>armor shop.
We have warmer armor!<sp:0:4:0>I know it's chilly here, but y'know what?
They say it's even colder at the <clr:0000>top of
the mountain<clr:ffff>! Brrr.<sp:0:4:0>You don't wanna freeze up there, mister!
Bundle up with some <clr:0000>warm gear<clr:ffff> right here
at the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff>!
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>If you don't like that, don't worry.
We've got plenty of other stuff too!
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're sold out now, but we'll get more
soon. Just give me a little while.<sp:0:4:0>It'll be worth it for all the different color
variations you can keep!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Oops, your bag is all stuffed with...stuff.
If you wanna get rid of something, I'll pay
you for it!
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Mister! <sp:5:1:0>What's gotten into you?!<sp:0:4:0>It's cold in the village, <sp:5:0:0>and it's <clr:0000>even
colder up in the mountains<clr:ffff>!
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff> armor shop!<sp:5:1:0>
If you want clothes that'll keep you warm
in the snow, you're in the right place!
Talk1015_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Mister! <sp:5:1:0>What's gotten into you?!<sp:0:4:0>Sure, the blizzard's stopped, <sp:5:0:0>but it's still
<clr:0000>cold up in the mountains<clr:ffff>!
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Having warm clothes won't do any good
if you don't remember to <clr:0000>put them on<clr:ffff>!
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, mister!<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard stopped, so the grown-ups
are back. But I'm still gonna help out
around the shop!<sp:0:4:0>There's always work to do!
Talk2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I worked hard today, and I'm gonna
work hard tomorrow too!
